sub_title: Storyteller at Anna Reissert Communications, Docent at TIO
summary:
I’m a native German communications specialist with over 12 years’ experience in the creative industry. I have organized events and collaborated with interesting, talented, creative people from all over the globe.

Working at TIO university of applied science I am teaching German and CCD to the next generation in business and tourism. 

As an independent, I specialize in English and German copywriting, storytelling, translation to German, creative writing, external (international) communications, event organization, design organization, project management in design. Enhancing networks, connecting people to help business and communications between people and cultures.

At heart I’m a creative writer and a passionate story teller. Stories connect people, help people remember and understand. Stories work for brands, companies, and people. And so do I. Once upon a time I turned even a simple sentence into a story – and it’s still what I do best!

For six years I was the lead project manager for the world’s biggest international young designers competition: the iF concept design award at iF International Forum Design in Hannover, Germany. This has allowed me to apply my experience in communication and organisation to design-related fields. 

I am a storyteller. I can assist with finding and coaching on stories - corporate, personal or product stories - and making the connection to the German market.
